SELECT m1.id AS id1, m1.`name` AS 'name1', m2.id AS id2 , m2.`name` AS 'name2', m3.id AS id3, m3.`name` AS 'name3' FROM menu AS m1,menu AS m2,menu AS m3 WHERE m1.id=m2.parentId AND m2.id=m3.parentId AND m3.enabled =TRUE ORDER BY m1.id ,m2.id,m3.id

SELECT distinct m1.* , m2.id AS 'id2', m2.url AS 'ur2', m2.path AS 'path2', m2.component AS 'component2', m2.`name` AS 'name2', m2.iconCls AS 'iconCls2', m2.keepAlive AS 'keepAlive2', m2.requireAuth AS 'requireAuth2', m2.parentId AS 'parentId2', m2.enabled AS 'enabled2' FROM menu AS m1 ,menu AS m2, hr_role AS hrr ,menu_role AS mr WHERE m1.id = m2.parentId AND hrr.hrid = #{id} AND hrr.rid = mr.rid AND mr.mid = m2.id AND m2.enabled = TRUE and m1.enabled=true order by m1.id,m2.id
SELECT m.* ,r.id AS 'rid',r.`name` AS 'rname',r.nameZh AS 'rnameZh' FROM menu m,menu_role mr,role r WHERE m.id=mr.mid and mr.rid=r.id
